FILE: cm710820v11.0.txt
DYAD: CHINA - MALAYSIA
RIVALRY: RIV1308
DISPUTE(S): MID3616 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190318
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190318

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3616

TERRMID: MID3616 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3616 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3616 1 -- maritime MID
MARITMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID3616 coded maritime MID because the disputed islands were being disputed due to the implications for a maritime boundary (an EEZ) associated with controlling the islands. 

ISLMID: MID3616 1 -- islands MID
ISLMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID3616 from Gibler 2018, a small chain of islands was being disputed between Malaysia and China, and in 1983 Malaysia sent troops to occupy the islands. China protested. Coded islands MID because this was connected to an islands dispute. 

CIVWARMID: MID3616 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3616 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3616 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3616 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3616 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
